ygData.messageBody:
I play a shaman and a warrior and wanted to play
a caster. I stopped playing my wizard at level 6.
The feedback I'd read from many experienced players,
made me realize that I would be really depressed if I
continued. So I've started and Enchanter and am having a lot
of fun.<br><br>Wizards have DD, teleport, and
root.<br><br>Wizard DD is about 5-15% more effective than mages and
druids and those classes have features that more than
outweigh this.<br><br>If you are playing a class that can
teleport and nuke, Druid is soooooo much more versatile,
they can heal for example. If you just like to nuke, a
mage pet is a handy thing to have around. If you like
to solo, play a necro or a mage.<br><br>The class is
not broken and can bring value to a group, but
Wizzies are not a required class. I would much rather
play a cleric for example. Boring, maybe, but very
much needed by other players. Wizards have no role
that cannot be filled by other classed, other than
Alter Plane Hate. Bottom line is there is still a huge
'suck factor' that needs to be addressed.
